content: this vest is worked in two pieces and seamed together use the tapestry crochet method for the main colorwork portion of the vest carry both colors together throughout each row crocheting over the strand that is not in use to change colors within a row work up to the final pull through with the old color complete the stitch with the new color **sizes** xs s m l 1x 2x 3x 4x 5x shown in s size **finished measurements** bust 35 39½ 44¼ 47½ 52¼ 55½ 59 63½ 68¼ length 20½ 21¼ 22 22¾ 23½ 24¼ 25 25¾ 26½ **materials** premier® yarns premier basix® worsted 100% acrylic 7oz/200g 359yds/328m mc 1115-40 navy 2 2 2 3 3 3 3 4 4 balls cc 1115-33 hazel 1 1 2 2 2 2 2 2 3 balls hook us size h-8 5 mm and us i-9 5 5 mm or size needed to obtain gauge notions tapestry needle removable stitch marker **gauge** 14 single_crochet x 16 row = 4 save time check your gauge
